member.name: T:VISABConnector.AsyncHelper
member.summary: Helper class for running asynchronous methods synchronously without deadlocking the current thread. Should be used when VISABApi has to be used in non async methods. TODO: Should probably be removed.

member.name: M:VISABConnector.AsyncHelper.RunSynchronously``1(System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task{``0}})
member.summary: Invokes the given Func on a different thread and waits on execution finish
member.typeparam: The return type of the Func
member.returns: The result of the Func invocation

member.summary: Invokes the given Func on a different thread and waits on execution finish
member.typeparam: The type of the first parameter
The return type of the Func
member.returns: The result of the Func invocation

member.typeparam: The type of the first parameter
The type of the second parameter
The return type of the Func

member.summary: Makes a request to the VISAB WebApi and deserialiazes the responses content.
member.param: The HttpMethod used for the request
The relative url for the request
The query parameters for the request
member.returns: A ApiResponse object with the deserialized content if sucessful. Otherwise the content has the default value of TResponse.

member.typeparam: The type of the body to serialize
member.param: The HttpMethod used for the request
The relative url for the request
The query parameters for the request
member.returns: A ApiResponse object with the deserialized content if sucessful. Otherwise the content has the default value of TResponse.

member.param: The HttpMethod used for the request
The relative url for the request
The query parameters for the request
member.returns: A ApiResponse object with set content if successful. Content is null if not successful.
